name: Slime Bros
description:
Little BubbleBobble-like game with a cute slime for main character :)

Couldn't make a proper game in time for the jam, enemies don't have any IA, so you only can bite them and then launch them so they rebound on the screen.

Controls: XBox Gamepad or cursors + z + x.

Originally it should have 2 players (hence the "bros" in the name XD), 15 more stages and bosses, but I didn't had enough time, sorry guys ^_^U

Music by Mark Sparling https://soundcloud.com/marksparling Thank you very much Mark! :D
